lyrics.lyric: Sometimes I lay under the moon

lyrics.tlyric: 感谢上帝让我还继续呼吸着

lyrics.lyric: Then I pray don't take me soon
lyrics.tlyric: 然后祈祷别这么快把我带走

lyrics.lyric: 'Cause I am here for a reason
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我留在这是有原因的

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes in my tears I drown
lyrics.tlyric: 有时候我沉溺在自己的眼泪中

lyrics.lyric: But I never let it get me down

lyrics.tlyric: 所以每当被消极的情绪包围着

lyrics.lyric: I know some day it'll all turn around
lyrics.tlyric: 我也知道总有一天一切都会好转

lyrics.lyric: Because all my life I've been waiting for
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我这一生所等待的

lyrics.lyric: I've been praying for, for the people to say
lyrics.tlyric: 我一直为之祈祷的，是为了让人们说出

lyrics.lyric: That we don't wanna fight no more

lyrics.tlyric: 我们的孩子将尽情玩耍

lyrics.lyric: It's not about win or lose
When they feed on the souls of the innocent
lyrics.tlyric: 当他们以无辜的灵魂为食

lyrics.lyric: Keep on moving though the waters stay raging
lyrics.tlyric: 即使面对汹涌洪流也不停下脚步

lyrics.lyric: In this maze, you can lose your way, you way
lyrics.tlyric: 在这个迷宫里你会迷路，迷失你的路

lyrics.lyric: But don't let it faze you, no way, no way
lyrics.tlyric: 但不要轻易被它打倒，绝不，绝不

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes in my tears I drown，I drown
lyrics.tlyric: 有时候我沉溺在自己的眼泪中

lyrics.lyric: But I never let it get me down

lyrics.tlyric: 所以每当被消极的情绪包围着

lyrics.lyric: I know some day it'll all turn around
lyrics.tlyric: 我也知道总有一天一切都会好转

lyrics.lyric: Because all my life I've been waiting for
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我这一生所等待的

lyrics.lyric: I've been praying for, for the people to say
lyrics.tlyric: 我一直为之祈祷的，是为了让人们说出

lyrics.lyric: That we don't wanna fight no more

lyrics.tlyric: 我们的孩子将尽情玩耍

lyrics.lyric: One day this all will change
lyrics.tlyric: 有朝一日这一切都将改变

lyrics.lyric: Treat people the same, stop with the violence
lyrics.tlyric: 不再有歧视，不再有暴力

lyrics.lyric: One day we'll all be free
lyrics.tlyric: 有朝一日我们都将自由

lyrics.lyric: And proud to be under the same sun
lyrics.tlyric: 在同一个太阳下都满怀骄傲

lyrics.lyric: Singing songs of freedom like why-oh why-oh
lyrics.tlyric: 唱着自由的歌，就像这样

lyrics.lyric: All my life I've been waiting for
I've been praying for, for the people to say
lyrics.tlyric: 我一直为之祈祷的，是为了让人们说出

lyrics.lyric: That we don't wanna fight no more

lyrics.tlyric: 我们的孩子将尽情玩耍

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Matisyahu/The Smeezingtons (Bruno Mars/Ari Levine and Philip Lawrence)
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Matisyahu/The Smeezingtons (Bruno Mars/Ari Levine and Philip Lawrence)
[00:10.734]Producers : David Kahne/Eric Krasno & Adam Deitch/Prince Ben/Di Genius (Son of Freddie)/Philip "Fish" Fisher (Fishbone)/John Norwood Fisher (Fishbone)/Sly & Robbie
[00:13.734]Sometimes I lay under the moon
[00:17.360]And thank God I'm breathing
[00:20.682]Then I pray don't take me soon
[00:23.927]'Cause I am here for a reason
[00:26.374]Sometimes in my tears I drown
[00:29.375]But I never let it get me down
[00:32.655]So when negativity surrounds
[00:35.964]I know some day it'll all turn around
[00:38.998]Because all my life I've been waiting for
[00:42.463]I've been praying for, for the people to say
[00:46.247]That we don't wanna fight no more
[00:49.137]There'll be no more wars
[00:50.775]And our children will play
[00:52.857]One day
[00:54.526]One day
[00:56.217]One day
[00:59.542]One day
[01:01.168]One day
[01:02.787]One day
[01:06.810]It's not about win or lose
[01:10.201]'Cause we all lose
[01:11.469]When they feed on the souls of the innocent
[01:14.396]Blood-drenched pavement
[01:16.058]Keep on moving though the waters stay raging
[01:20.201]In this maze, you can lose your way, you way
[01:25.620]It might drive you crazy
[01:27.187]But don't let it faze you, no way, no way
[01:32.529]Sometimes in my tears I drown
[01:35.498]But I never let it get me down
[01:38.804]So when negativity surrounds
[01:42.315]I know some day it'll all turn around
[01:45.149]Because all my life I've been waiting for
[01:48.681]I've been praying for, for the people to say
[01:52.483]That we don't wanna fight no more
[01:55.323]There'll be no more wars
[01:56.914]And our children will play
[01:59.034]One day
[02:00.704]One day
[02:02.416]One day
[02:05.732]One day
[02:07.386]One day
[02:08.987]One day
[02:12.178]One day this all will change
[02:13.871]Treat people the same, stop with the violence
[02:17.244]Down with the hate
[02:18.896]One day we'll all be free
[02:20.517]And proud to be under the same sun
[02:23.897]Singing songs of freedom like why-oh why-oh
[02:38.810]All my life I've been waiting for
[02:41.718]I've been praying for, for the people to say
[02:45.477]That we don't wanna fight no more
[02:48.267]There'll be no more wars
[02:49.946]And our children will play
[02:52.074]One day
[02:53.741]One day
[02:55.382]One day
[02:58.719]One day
[03:00.359]One day
[03:01.981]One day

tlyric.lyric:
[by:-羽山秋人-]
[00:13.734]有时候躺在月光下的我
[00:17.360]感恩上帝让我还能活着
[00:20.682]祈祷祂暂别带我入天国
[00:23.927]因为我在此是有原因的
[00:26.374]有时候眼泪会将我吞没
[00:29.375]但我从不放弃得过且过
[00:32.655]所以即使沮丧环绕着我
[00:35.964]我相信它终将化为泡沫
[00:38.998]我穷尽一生等一个结果
[00:42.463]祈祷人们发自肺腑地说
[00:46.247]不愿相互争夺杀戮同伙
[00:49.137]不再有纷飞连天的战火
[00:50.775]我们的孩子尽情玩耍着
[00:52.857]这一天终会到来
[00:54.526]这一天终会到来
[00:56.217]这一天终会到来
[00:59.542]这一天终会到来
[01:01.168]这一天终会到来
[01:02.787]这一天终会到来
[01:06.810]这并非你胜我败的竞赛
[01:10.201]当无辜的人们惨遭戕害
[01:11.469]流离失所城市血海成灾
[01:14.396]我们谁都无法置身事外
[01:16.058]汹涌潮水无法将你阻碍
[01:20.201]即使茫茫大雾将你困住
[01:25.620]或许会逼得你疯狂怯步
[01:27.187]但请不要轻易低头认输
[01:32.529]有时候眼泪会将我吞没
[01:35.498]但我从不放弃得过且过
[01:38.804]所以即使沮丧环绕着我
[01:42.315]我相信它终将化为泡沫
[01:45.149]我穷尽一生等一个结果
[01:48.681]祈祷人们发自肺腑地说
[01:52.483]不愿相互争夺杀戮同伙
[01:55.323]不再有纷飞连天的战火
[01:56.914]我们的孩子尽情玩耍着
[01:59.034]这一天终会到来
[02:00.704]这一天终会到来
[02:02.416]这一天终会到来
[02:05.732]这一天终会到来
[02:07.386]这一天终会到来
[02:08.987]这一天终会到来
[02:12.178]有朝一日恶行将被遏止
[02:13.871]不会有暴力不再有歧视
[02:17.244]仇恨的目光将彻底消失
[02:18.896]有朝一日我们都将自由
[02:20.517]在同个太阳下骄傲昂首
[02:23.897]快乐地吟唱歌颂着自由
[02:38.810]我穷尽一生等一个结果
[02:41.718]祈祷人们发自肺腑地说
[02:45.477]不愿相互争夺杀戮同伙
[02:48.267]不再有纷飞连天的战火
